name: Matando Cabos
summary_text: A dark, offbeat comedy about a group of Mexico City teens embroiled in a kidnapping involving a retired wrestling legend and a parrot.

name: Love Affair
summary_text: A French playboy and an American former nightclub singer fall in love aboard a ship.

name: The Eye 2
summary_text: After a failed suicide attempt, a pregnant woman gains the ability to see ghosts.

name: The Survivors
summary_text: Having both lost their jobs, two strangers become unlikely friends after a run in with a would be robber, who is actually a hitman with a grudge against the two.

name: What Time Is It There?
summary_text: A watch salesman meets a young woman soon leaving for Paris and becomes infatuated, so he begins to change all the clocks in Taipei to Paris time.

name: Wanted: Dead or Alive
summary_text: Bounty hunter Nick Randall (Rutger Hauer) is offered two hundred fifty thousand dollars by the C.I.A. to get the terrorist behind the bombing of a Los Angeles, California movie theater. Nick quit the C.I.A. because he couldn't trust them. Can they be trusted now, and can he stop the terrorists?

name: Lying and Stealing
summary_text: Ivan steals art for the Greek. He wants out but can he? He meets an actress at 2 of his "jobs". She has her own problems but helps him.

name: Armenian Genocide
summary_text: The first Genocide of the 20th century when over a million Armenians died at the hands of the Ottoman Turks during World War I, between 1915 and 1918.

name: Kriegerin
summary_text: Marisa hates foreigners, and she finds them guilty of the decline of her country. But her convictions will slowly evolve when she accidentally meets a young Afghan refugee.

name: The Couch Trip
summary_text: A burnt-out shrink needs a temp. A charming escaped convict takes over his practice and radio show.

summary_text: Deniz, an acclaimed author, is writing a book about his family and friends. He asks Orhan for critics. The day Orhan came to Istanbul from London, Deniz disappears. Orhan, Deniz's friend Neval and Deniz's lover Yusuf tries to find Deniz.

summary_text: The screwball cops of Special Vehicles Section 2 Division 2 must investigate and stop a spree of rampaging construction robots.

summary_text: Ogami Itto volunteers to be tortured by the yakuza to save a prostitute and is hired by their leader to kill an evil chamberlain.

summary_text: After a break-up, a young woman decides to start a gallery where people can leave trinkets from past relationships.

summary_text: Jerry falls in love with a stripper he meets at a carnival. Little does he know that she is the sister of a gypsy fortune teller whose predictions he had scoffed at earlier. The gypsy turns him into a zombie and he goes on a killing spree.

summary_text: A chronicle of the Cristeros War (1926-1929); a war by the people of Mexico against the atheistic Mexican government.

summary_text: A major countermands orders and attacks to avenge a previous massacre of men, women, and children.

name: Angels of Sex
summary_text: The established relationship between university student Bruno and aspiring photographer Carla is thrown into turmoil when Bruno feels drawn to sexy karate instructor/break dancer Rai. Complications ensue.

name: Breaking Wind
summary_text: A comedic spoof based on the worldwide phenomenon, The Twilight Saga.

name: The Traveler

summary_text: An LA police officer is murdered in the onion fields outside of Bakersfield. However, legal loopholes could keep his kidnappers from receiving justice, and his partner is haunted by overwhelming survivor's guilt.

summary_text: Although married Chinese farmers Wang and O-Lan initially experience success, their lives are complicated by declining fortunes and lean times, as well as the arrival of the beautiful young Lotus.

name: Distorted
summary_text: A couple moves to an isolated, modern, safe apartment building with CCTV after the wife has problems with nightmares. However, something's not quite right with the building.

name: Wolf Warrior
summary_text: A Chinese special force soldier with extraordinary marksmanship is confronted by a group of deadly foreign mercenaries who are hired to assassinate him by a vicious drug lord.

summary_text: A mysterious circus comes to a western town bearing wonders and characters that entertain the inhabitants and teach valuable lessons.

name: Show Boat
summary_text: The daughter of a riverboat captain falls in love with a charming gambler, but their fairytale romance is threatened when his luck turns sour.

name: Heights
summary_text: Spanning twenty-four hours, Heights follows five New Yorkers challenged to choose their destiny before the sun comes up the next day.

name: Sheena

name: Deathstalker

name: The House of Fear
summary_text: Sherlock Holmes investigates a series of deaths at a castle with each foretold by the delivery of orange pips to the victims.

name: The Dark
summary_text: An undead teenage girl befriends a blind boy that she meets in a forest she haunts and hunts in. Both have been victims of unimaginable abuse, and each finds solace in the other. There may be a chance of light at the end of their tunnel, but it will come with a body count.

name: I Wanna Hold Your Hand
summary_text: In 1964, six teenagers from New Jersey run off to see The Beatles perform on The Ed Sullivan Show (1948) in the hope of meeting their idols. However, they don't have tickets. Along the way, they learn new things about friendship and growing up.

summary_text: Mia moves to South Africa with her family to manage a lion farm and develops a special bond with Charlie, a white lion cub. However, things change when she uncovers her father's secret.

summary_text: The two American Ninjas, Joe Armstrong and Sean Davidson, team up to do battle against a terrorist and his band of Ninjas.

summary_text: Giant mutant rabbits terrorize the south-west.

name: Ten Canoes

name: Listen to Your Heart

summary_text: In the lost holy land of Milos, the Elrics search for the truth behind an unknown form of alchemy. What secrets are hidden in Milos? Riddles must be solved and dangers faced before the truth can be found.
